main event: Observers in Salisbury, North Carolina reported seeing two white colored objects trailing RF-4C aircraft on October 12, 1966.
interesting points: Five RF-4C aircraft were airborne south of Salisbury when the objects were observed., The objects were described as white and one of them stopped in midair and then accelerated., Ronald Peeler, a 13-year-old, reported a sighting of an object that chased him while he was near his home., Peeler described the object as being the size of a low-flying plane with red and green lights., There were no other confirmed reports of the incident.
